Pre-Game Insights: Rassie Van der Dussen said South Africa will continue with their'must-win' mindset in the semifinal against Australia.
Van der Dussen mentioned that Australia have a good reference of playing in knockout matches due to their past experiences in winning the World Cup and playing in semifinals.
Miscellaneous Highlights: South Africa thrashed Australia by 134 runs in the league stage match last month.
South Africa broke their jinx of losing while chasing by successfully chasing down Afghanistan's 244 and taking the match to a five-wicket win.
Others: Skipper Temba Bavuma will be a doubtful starter for the semifinal after sustaining a hamstring injury.
Reeza Hendricks is likely to open the batting if Bavuma misses out.
